messages.subject: That Mary person was Re: Modeling
messages.msgSnippet: ... Okay. Perhaps the phrase tear apart, even referring to an idea, is making you uncomfortable. That s not my intent. How about discuss, debate, ponder,
messages.messageBody:
>>I find your use of words here rather difficult to grasp. Its one thing to
>>tear apart a subject, and another to tear apart ones skills as a parent.>>

Okay. Perhaps the phrase tear apart, even referring to an idea, is making
you uncomfortable. That's not my intent. How about discuss, debate, ponder,
revisit, re-evaluate an idea? And I'll state again, I was NOT talking about
anyone's skills as a parent. Really. I will be the first one to lay my
parenting skills bare to show what I have learned and still need to learn. I
have no need or desire to tear apart anyone.

>>If you are the Mary, that Teresa has written about. Than I will shall let
>>this die out right here and now.>>

LOL! I have no idea if I'm "the Mary that Teresa has written about." What an
interesting comment to make.

>>And as a member of this group, I will respond when I so chose.>>

Of course.

Life is good.
~Mary
